events.name: Adobe Game Jam - Hamburg
events.about:
Adobe Game Jam
Hamburg – February 15 & 16

Are you into building Games? Do you want to show your gaming coding skills, have fun, and win some cool prizes? Then come join us February 15 & 16 for the Adobe Game Jam.  You’ll meet likeminded people and learn more about Flash game design and development.

Rules:  http://gaming.adobe.com/events/gamejams/

Prizes

12-month subscription to Adobe Creative Cloud®

*Prizes may vary by location according to availablity of Creative Cloud.

Participants will vote for winners

Requirements

  • You will need to bring your own equipment (laptop and/or devices ) to build and demo the game. (There will be limited set of devices available on-site for testing and presenting your game)
  • You should be somewhat familiar with programming in ActionScript 3.
  • To save time, either Flash Builder 4.7 beta (free download) or Flash Professional CS6 (free 30-day trial available) are recommended to already be installed on your laptop before the Game Jame begins.
  • Wi-Fi will be provided

Schedule- please note this is not an overnight event.


Friday, February 15th

3:00PM       
 Registration/Meet & Greet
3:30PM Introduction: Demo of Stage 3D apps for iOS/Android + Desktop and a basic walkthough of available engines and tooling.
4:30PM 
 Brainstorm & Teams: You can work solo or form a team of up to 5 members.  Experts will be on hand to help you implement a plan for Saturday’s coding.
6:00PM End of Day 1


*Dinner and beverages will be provided


Saturday, February 16th

9:00AM        Check -in (Coffee & breakfast will be provided)
9:30AM Start coding! Experts will be on hand to answer questions and help troubleshoot.
12:30PM

Break for Lunch (Catered lunch)
5:00PM All Games Finalized
5:00-6:00PM Game Showcase
  Teams present games (5 min each)
  Attendees vote on games
 

Winners & Prizes announced







 

Location:

Adobe Systems Engineering GmbH
Große Elbstraße 27
22767 Hamburg, Germany
http://goo.gl/maps/uCqsU
